# Test 1
```{r}
x = c(1, 2, 5, 6, 8)
y = c(x[1:3], 7, 9)
xy = x + y
x
y
xy

num_list <- list(1,2,3,4,5)
day_list <- list("Mon","Tue","Wed", "Thurs", "Fri")
merge_list <- c(num_list, day_list)
merge_list

#Create lists.
int_list <- list(1:5)
print(int_list)
int_list2 <- list(10:14)
print(int_list2)

#Convert the lists to vectors.
vec1 <- unlist(int_list)
vec2 <- unlist(int_list2)
print(vec1)
print(vec2)

#Now add the vectors.
sum <- vec1 + vec2 
print(sum)
```
